summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1949, for the improvement of West Roy Street from 2nd Avenue West to 3rd Avenue West; and 2nd Avenue West from West Roy Street to Olympic Place, all in the City of Seattle by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 20124 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
